tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** ****** ****** *** ** * ********.She ensured a perfect delivery experience.I respect her alot n always say she is second only to my own mom for me.
Thankyou mam i wish you the moon n the stars always 
Grateful is a small word

Stuti
Munich/New Delhi

** ****** ** ** ********* ****** *** a gem of a person. 
She explains everything very properly to her patients and is one of the most ethical doctors I have come across. 
Madam is well versed with all the latest updates in her field and she gives the best guidance to her patients. 
All words are less to explain the warmth and competence Dr Poonam has, and all I can say is that if one wants the most genuine,honest and ethical treatment, then please visit Dr Poonam.

Dr Poonam Tara is an amazing Doctor as is always full of energy and positivity whenever you meet her. Whatever time of the day she is always brimming with positivity and energy. We went to her for pregnancy scans and consultation during a complicated situation during the 2nd trimester scans and were in very complicated and scary situation. She ensured that she brought in required additional consultants where needed and went out of her way to get inputs from many other senior doctors for us to help understand the situation and chose a path forward. She is a fabulous person always worried about the patients well-being and progress. An amazing doctor to help during a very complicated phase of our journey. Can’t thank you enough Doc. God bless you.
Well-spoken, humble, and sweetest doctor I have met, I couldn't have asked for a better doctor. *** ** ****** *** **** ****** *** has an ample amount of experience. I am very much satisfied with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Amazing doctor with complete care and concern.Got very positive vibes. She is friendly and genuine.God bless her always
